officialTitle: Assessment of Intercostal Block Scheduling in Preventing Acute Surgical and Post-surgical Pain in Thoracoscopic Surgery
inclusionCriteria:
* Thoracoscopic surgery candidate.
* Over 18 years old.
* No known allergy to Bupivacaine.
* Patient is able to read understand and singe an inform consent.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Previous thoracic operation in the same side.
